alert.note: Alert for Henderson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 4:25PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Henderson, east central Henry, Des Moines and southwestern Louisa Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 425 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Morning Sun, or 11 miles southwest of Wapello, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could cause minor tree limb damage and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Burlington, Oquawka, West Burlington, New London, Mediapolis, Danville, Morning Sun, Middletown, Mount Union, Gulf Port, Amber, Iowa Army Ammunition Plant, Kossuth, Kingston, Sperry, Big Hollow Recreation Area, Pleasant Grove, Beaverdale, Virginia Grove Recreation Area, and Northfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
